column5: Anyone live in the town of Durham here...PM me please and thank you!
I don't think Durham is a town. More like a Region or County...includes Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Bowmanville, Port Perry, etc. Maybe you need to be more specific.
Durham is a town North of Mount Forest on Hwy 6.  Nice little spot.  All amenities and a lot of "big box stores".  Jer, do you research!  hahahaa
Know ppl who live up in Hanover... and drive through Durham often on the way North.  Jen
hi there. fish durham and surrounding areab all the time. will be up yhere this week for some specks. anything i can help you with? kitchenerboy
was wondering the water clarity....found that out but then had my fishing partner bail at the last minute so I never made it up there for opener.....oh well! Thanks for replies guys!
I can imagine the crowd up at Allan Park this morning. I always liked the Saugeens, especially the Beatty and the Rocky.
i went to a place last year and there was nobody there from 3pm to dark, I fished different parts of the Saugeen all day long and only saw maybe 4 anglers all day, it was nice.
